snippet.title: C64 Addams Family longplay
snippet.description:
I reckon I belong in a minority, but I think this game is pretty good. It's got only one real problem: the dreadful sound. Turn off the sound and play some atmospheric tune in your SidPlay (say, the Last Ninja 3 tune) and the game will immediately transform to a charming arcade-adventure.

OK, so it would be nice if Ocean had converted the brilliant 16-bit game, but they didn't. The 8-bit game is still good.

In this longplay, I keep exploration to a minimum, just finding the necessary keys and the family members. If you like exploration, this game is huge, with lots extra lives, hearts and credits scattered around the mansion.
